```{r}

# Attach packages

library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)

# Read in & clean up data

lobster_data <- read_csv("lobster_abundance_sbc_lter.csv", 
                         na = "-99999") %>% 
  clean_names()

# Tidy data by uncounting counts

lobster_tidy <- lobster_data %>% 
  uncount(count)
```
